thread.title: Moonlight wins Best Picture at Oscars after EPIC mix up when Warren Beatty announces La La Land as winner
thread.title_full: Moonlight wins Best Picture at Oscars after EPIC mix up when Warren Beatty announces La La Land as winner

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Moonlight wins Best Picture at Oscars after EPIC mix up when Warren Beatty announces La La Land as winner
text:
Moonlight wins Best Picture at Oscars after EPIC mix up when Warren Beatty announces La La Land as winner Warren Beatty's flub has just gone down in Oscars history Share Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
In the most jaw-dropping moment from this year's Oscars , Moonlight has been announced as the winner of Best Picture - but not before La La Land was announced as winner. 
Actor Warren Beatty, who was joined by Faye Dunaway, read the incorrect name - saying Emma Stone and Ryan Gosling's La La Land had scooped the top gong. 
The movie's cast and crew even took to the stage to accept the award, but seconds later they had to explain they weren't the winners and that it was actually the Barry Jenkins-directed movie that had won. 
Host of the night Jimmy Kimmel looked completely perplexed as Warren explained that he had misread the card. US actor Warren Beatty (C) (Photo: AFP) 
“I’m still not sure this is real,” producer Adele Romanski said after going up to collect the gong from the La La Land cast. 
Elsewhere, Casey Affleck scooped the Best Actor award for his role by Manchester In The Sea, while Emma took home the Best Actress gong for her role in La La Land. 
Viola Davis won the Best Supporting Actress gong for her role in Fences, while Mahershala Ali took home the Supporting Actor award for his role in Moonlight.
